CHAT.comment: DISTRICT ATTORNEY'S OFFICE FOR THE THIRD JUDICIAL DISTRICT, ET AL., Petitioners v. WILLIAM G. OSBORNE.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:05 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF KENNETH M. ROSENSTEIN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF NEAL K. KATYAL ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF PETER NEUFELD ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF KENNETH M. ROSENSTEIN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:17 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
